altTitles.en: I Do It Because I Want to

description.en:
This book shows the usual interests in Cuvie's tales : that's bits of drama, romance, sweet love & search of happiness.

- Melt (Ch. 1-4)
Kazuki can't clearly explain it but something is missing in his life, sadly the people around him can't really notice this, not even his sweet girlfriend Momoko. One day Kazuki notices that his closest childhood friend Mitsuki-nee returns to town after leaving 8 years ago.

- Every Thing (Ch. 5)
Haruka really wants to get along with Reiji, who is her mother's new fiancee. She wants to have a nice relationship with someone who could become her stepfather someday.. But suddently, her mother has started meeting another guy, cutting off Reiji completely. Will Haruka do the same?

- Easy Love (Ch. 6-8)
Kakeru was talking to Azusa, his eternal childhood friend whom he trust completely, how he was really bored and if there it was something exciting to do. Azusa's answer to that question surprised Kakeru, aparently changing his life completely... Even if it was something as simple as a kiss. Less...

**TAGS**
**MALE** cheating, netorare, prostate massage
**FEMALE** blowjob, daughter, footjob, netorare, paizuri, schoolgirl uniform, sister, swinging
**MIXED** group, incest, inseki
**OTHER** multi-work series, tankoubon, uncensored
